title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-3.10 - Data and calculations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-3.10 - Data and calculations

State Regulations

Each application for a permit to construct a source of
air contamination for a facility subject to this Subpart must include: (a) basic engineering data relative to the
waste to be burned, incinerator design, combustion air, control devices and air
cleaning devices; and
(b) an impact
analysis using procedures acceptable to the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
219-3.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
